name: Bury Me In The Combat Zone
name_original: Bury Me In The Combat Zone
description:
Protect your 3 soldiers for as long as you can by tapping the screen in the area you would like to shoot your projectile.

Game was created on and designed for mobile devices (truest form of gaming). That being said the game has not been tested on computers, if you don’t own a mobile device your experience may vary.
